title: Which mobile is better, Samsung or Redmi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well i think i can answer this question . I have used both samsung and redmi smartphones and found some pros and cons in both the brands. So i am going to discuss all information related to samsung and redmi based on my experience but before that i request you to upvote my answer to show your support and increase the visibility of my answer. 1.)Display  When i talk about the display quality of both the devices , then i must clearly say that no doubt samsung is the best . Because the quality of display used in Samsung is really premium quality as compared to The Redmi Devices which have just an average quality LCD/IPS display . But in case of Samsung you get a AMOLED display in most of the devices So if you prefer a great display then go for Samsung. 2. Prices  When i see the budget range of both the brands , then you can clearly see that redmi phones are really affordable ,you can easily grab a great feature Redmi phone under 15,000 INR but when you compare the same features of the 15,000 Redmi phone with the Samsung phone you will see that the samsung phones list the same features as of redmi with a slight change and prices the phone at around 30k-40k INR. So you can clearly see the difference between the two Brands. 3.Heating issues Now in terms of of heating issues , i must say samsung is really good as i have used 2–3 redmi phones and i have got some heating issues after a certain period of time . What i have seen is that the build quality used in Redmi Phones are not that good as compared to Samsung, therefore this maybe be one of the reason for heating issues in Redmi Phones Maybe problem is in my device .But what i have experienced i have shared 4.Performance  When i talk about the performance of both the devices you will see a difference . What i meant to say is when you buy a Samsung phone at a price range of 10–15k you wont see a great performance . But when you move your price from 20k -40k you will see great performance and quality. In case of Redmi i must say you will experience great power at a low price range . So make your choice according to your budget. if your main focus is on power and performance. 5.Camera Quality  When i talk about the camera quality of both the brands . Samsung wins at every point . Dont see the pixels mentioned on the redmi devices like 48 MP or 108 MP . As i have seen a 12MP Samsung camera competing with Redmi 48MP Device. What i meant to say is samsung focuses more on the Quality . So if you have want a great camera you can go with Samsung. 6.Updates  Receiving time to time android or system updates makes your phone meet your future needs and improve its performance . So when see both the brands in terms of updates ,then i must say redmi receives updates more frequently than Samsung. I hope i have helped you choose the better phone based on your needs.
